title: Re: Keen in doom 2 pics
content:
Look here [url=http://www.3drealms.com/keenhistory/keenhistory3.html]www.3drealms.com/keenhistory/keenhistory3.html[/url]

On level 32 in doom 2 you have to kill four hanging keens to complete the level.

I'm just making fun of that.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-pogo.gif[/img]

title: Re: Keen in doom 2 pics
content: You don't have to kill keen to beat the game and in the German version of doom 2, levels 31 and 32 (secret levels) were taken out because of wolfinstien 3D.

title: Re: Keen in doom 2 pics
content: No but you DO still have to kill Commander Keen to get out of that particular level.

title: Re: Keen in doom 2 pics
content:
Why would the German version lack two levels? Were they ripoffs of Wolfenstein 3D? Was it a copywright issue?

Keen isn't an infant, and besides Keen is cartoony enough to qualify as a cartoon, and there's always plenty of violence in those!
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Cute bunny!

title: Re: Keen in doom 2 pics
content:
Levellass wrote:
Why would the German version lack two levels? Were they ripoffs of Wolfenstein 3D? Was it a copywright issue?
Keen isn't an infant, and besides Keen is cartoony enough to qualify as a cartoon, and there's always plenty of violence in those!

Yeah, but not with so much blood. There's a big difference between the kind of violence of Tom & Jerry and the Doom violence.

And the German versions lack two levels probably because it referenced Wolfenstein 3D. Wolf 3D was NEVER distributed in Germany, and guess why. It isn't too difficult. What kind of people the main character is killing in the game? It starts with an 'N' and ends with an 'I'.

EDIT: Sarah, by the way, Keen is only 8 years old, and I think it would qualify as an infant.[hr]SM: "I could go and write a page about the Theory of Relativity (or whatever it's called), but, what is the point if I don't know what the Theory of Relativity is?"

[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/]My website[/url]

Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Keen in doom 2 pics
content:
[hr]Shadow Master It starts with an 'N' and ends with an 'I'.
[hr]And has nothing to do with Germany any more. People these days...
